Key Match Events: Draymond Green's foul against Zach Edey was upgraded to a Flagrant 1
Draymond Green was ejected for receiving two technical fouls within 33 seconds in the final two minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Taylor Jenkins, Grizzlies coach, was disappointed that Draymond Green's foul wasn't reviewed
Draymond Green was impressed by the Grizzlies' unconventional offense and described it as 'weird'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zach Edey had 14 points and 10 rebounds, leading all rookies in double-doubles this season
Draymond Green had 13 points, 8 rebounds, and 7 assists
Others: The Grizzlies believed in Zach Edey's potential to excel in the NBA despite concerns about his ability to thrive in a league that values mobile bigs who can make 3s and space the floor
